name: Youth and Society
description: This course examines youth as a social category, a critical stage in the life course. Topics to be covered include: Youth and music, health, work, and politics.
prerequisites: [SOCB05H3 or SOCB35H3] and [0.5 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3]
